registry.title: iana-bgp-l2-encaps YANG Module
registry.registration_rule: See BGP Layer 2 Encapsulation Types registry.
registry.description:
BGP Layer 2 encapsulation types must not be directly added to the "iana-bgp-l2-encaps" YANG module. They must instead be added to the "BGP Layer 2 Encapsulation Types" registry at .
Module: the initial module file will be posted upon 's publication as an RFC.
